description: Robust, breathable softshell jacket with loden inserts for vigorous tours. Made for demanding tours, the premium softshell Pordoi Jacket for men offers protection and a high degree of comfort thanks to its loden inserts and merino wool. For demanding ascents and speedy descents: The Pordoi Jacket for men can handle ski tours in any kind of weather.
name: Ortovox Pordoi Jacket - Mens
